sense.gloss: righteous government, just rule, kingship, rule of right, noble path
easy method, simple approach, short-cut, royal road
orthodox way, proper way, traditional manner, classic approach, tried-and-true method

sdata.j: ↑学問↑↓がくもん↓に|↑王道|↑↓おうどう↓なし。
sdata.e: There is no easy road to learning.

sdata.j: ↑上級↑↓じょうきゅう↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓が↑英語↑↓えいご↓↑力↑↓りょく↓（↑特↑↓とく↓に↑読解↑↓どっかい↓↑力↑↓りょく↓）をつけたければ、↑語彙↑↓ごい↓を↑増↑↓ふ↓やすのが|↑王道|↑↓おうどう↓ですね。
sdata.e: If the more advanced want to improve English ability (especially reading comprehension) increasing vocabulary is the way to go.

sdata.j: このメルマガは、↑昨今↑↓さっこん↓の↑語学↑↓ごがく↓↑産業↑↓さんぎょう↓↑界↑↓かい↓の↑甘言↑↓かんげん↓に↑躍↑↓おど↓らされることなく、↑文法↑↓ぶんぽう↓↑解釈↑↓かいしゃく↓という↑古典↑↓こてん↓↑的↑↓てき↓↑学習↑↓がくしゅう↓↑法↑↓ほう↓こそ|↑王道|↑↓おうどう↓と↑信↑↓しん↓じて↑疑↑↓うたが↓わない↑方↑↓ほう↓のためのメルマガです。
sdata.e: This e-zine is for those who, unswayed by the cajolery of the modern language industry, firmly trust that the traditional learning method of grammatical analysis is the way to go.
